mapper.select: select notice_index as noticeIndex, notice_type as noticeType, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_hit as noticeHit, notice_reg_date as noticeRegDate, notice_state as noticeState from notice_tbl where notice_state='정상'

select notice_index as noticeIndex, notice_type as noticeType, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_filename as noticeFilename, notice_filepath as noticeFilepath, notice_content as noticeContent from notice_tbl where notice_index=#{noticeIndex}
mapper.insert: insert into notice_tbl values (notice_index.nextval, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeFilename}, null, default, sysdate, #{noticeState})
mapper.update: update notice_tbl set notice_state='삭제' where notice_index=#{notice_index}
